│ Human: What's the status of the current implementation?                     │
│                                                                             │
│ Assistant: Let me check the current implementation status for you.          │
│                                                                             │
│ Error: Network error occurred while processing your request.                │
│ Please try again or check your internet connection.                         │
│                                                                             │
│ >                                                                           │
│                                                                             │
